TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: I can't wait for the new episode Bob! I will rewatch the old ones now...
Bob stop it. You're making me want to time warp to next Monday

its still in the works but hey its there

oh and bob, you might want to take a look at the SSP space shuttle program, a continuation of Css. It could be helpful for Alexandria

Boeing hangar or something?

oh and bob, you might want to take a look at the SSP space shuttle program, a continuation of Css. It could be helpful for Alexandria

its the CST-100 Processing facility
And here I am stuck on SLC-6s tower... The red part, that's hard.

I'm slowly building out Cape Canaveral for RSS for Project Alexandria:

I would love a copy of the cfg's when you're finished. Ya got it looking better than I was ever able to.

Looking at that shot ... I had thought the RVE textures had darkened a bit, but I wasn't sure if it was just my setup. I may try adjusting those grass textures on the launchpads a bit, so they blend in with the ground better, and I'll toss them up here if I get it looking right. I guess I should push those titan towers through unity again while I'm at it, since I think I only gave you guys the source models for them and not the .mu's. LC-36 on the end there actually doesn't look half bad with those models. It was the next one I had planned to make, and wanted to model the dual-pad as a separate launch site model.
Awesome Bob!

I would love a copy of the cfg's when you're finished. Ya got it looking better than I was ever able to.

Looking at that shot ... I had thought the RVE textures had darkened a bit, but I wasn't sure if it was just my setup. I may try adjusting those grass textures on the launchpads a bit, so they blend in with the ground better, and I'll toss them up here if I get it looking right. I guess I should push those titan towers through unity again while I'm at it, since I think I only gave you guys the source models for them and not the .mu's. My Alexandria CFGs (for everything, not just this mod) will always be here once they get pushed:

https://github.com/Felbourn/Project-Alexandria
When you get to around the shuttle age, could you get an rss,config for me...i am preparing for an rss shuttle series for youtube covering all shuttle missions. (Partly why i took over the ssp)

So about a month ago me and liquidhype thought to make the real launch sites that are at the Kennedy space center and make them for ksp. Little did I know we would have gotten all the support the we are getting. Thank you so much to everyone who is excited as much as we are to use this mod!!!

--------Triston (reese) wilson
